mapper.select: SELECT l.locationNo ,l.si ,l.gu ,l.dong FROM users u, location l WHERE u.locationNo = l.locationNo AND u.userNo = #{userNo}
SELECT locationNo ,si ,gu ,dong FROM location WHERE gu LIKE '%전체%'

SELECT t.trailNo ,t.name ,t.distance ,t.eta FROM trail t, coords c WHERE t.trailNo = c.useNo AND c.type = 'trail' AND c.coordorder = 1 AND c.lng BETWEEN #{swX} AND #{neX} AND c.lat BETWEEN #{swY} AND #{neY} AND t.status = 'T'

SELECT t.trailNo ,t.name ,t.distance ,t.eta ,TO_CHAR(t.regdate, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FROM trail t, coords c WHERE t.trailNo = c.useNo AND c.type = 'trail' AND c.coordorder = 1 AND c.lng BETWEEN #{swX} AND #{neX} AND c.lat BETWEEN #{swY} AND #{neY} AND t.status = 'T' ORDER BY t.regDate DESC

SELECT t.trailNo ,t.name ,t.distance ,t.eta ,TO_CHAR(t.regdate, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FROM trail t, coords c, ( SELECT COUNT(userNo) cnt ,trailNo FROM trailCmt WHERE status = 'T' GROUP BY trailNo ) gt WHERE t.trailNo = c.useNo AND t.trailNo = gt.trailNo AND c.type = 'trail' AND c.coordorder = 1 AND c.lng BETWEEN #{swX} AND #{neX} AND c.lat BETWEEN #{swY} AND #{neY} AND t.status = 'T' ORDER BY gt.cnt DESC

SELECT t.trailNo ,t.name ,t.distance ,t.eta ,TO_CHAR(t.regdate, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FROM trail t, coords c, ( SELECT COUNT(userNo) cnt ,trailNo FROM trailStar GROUP BY trailNo ) gt WHERE t.trailNo = c.useNo AND t.trailNo = gt.trailNo AND c.type = 'trail' AND c.coordorder = 1 AND c.lng BETWEEN #{swX} AND #{neX} AND c.lat BETWEEN #{swY} AND #{neY} AND t.status = 'T' ORDER BY gt.cnt DESC

SELECT ort.trailNo ,ort.name ,ort.distance ,ort.eta ,ort.regDate FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn ,ot.trailNo ,ot.name ,ot.distance ,ot.eta ,ot.regDate FROM (SELECT t.trailNo ,t.name ,t.distance ,t.eta ,TO_CHAR(t.regdate, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') regDate
FROM trail t, coords c, ( SELECT COUNT(tt.walkLogNo) cnt ,tt.trailNo FROM trailUsed tt, trailTag ta WHERE tt.trailNo = ta.trailNo
FROM trail t, coords c, ( SELECT COUNT(tt.userNo) cnt ,tt.trailNo FROM trailStar tt, trailTag ta WHERE tt.trailNo = ta.trailNo
FROM trail t, coords c, ( SELECT COUNT(tt.userNo) cnt ,tt.trailNo FROM trailCmt tt, trailTag ta WHERE tt.trailNo = ta.trailNo AND tt.status = 'T'
FROM trail t, coords c, ( SELECT tt.trailNo FROM trailTag tt WHERE tt.trailNo > 0
AND ta.tagName IN
#{item}
GROUP BY tt.trailNo ) gt WHERE t.trailNo = c.useNo AND t.trailNo = gt.trailNo AND c.type = 'trail' AND c.coordorder = 1 AND c.lng BETWEEN #{coordsMap.swX} AND #{coordsMap.neX} AND c.lat BETWEEN #{coordsMap.swY} AND #{coordsMap.neY} AND t.status = 'T'
ORDER BY gt.cnt DESC
ORDER BY t.regDate DESC
) ot ) ort WHERE ort.rn >= 1 AND ort.rn <= 10
SELECT c.useNo ,c.coordOrder ,c.lat ,c.lng FROM trail t, coords c WHERE t.trailNo = c.useNo AND c.type = 'trail' AND c.useNo = #{trailNo} AND t.status = 'T' ORDER BY c.coordOrder
SELECT t.trailNo ,t.name ,t.distance ,t.eta ,TO_CHAR(t.regdate, 'YY-MM-DD') regDate ,u.userNo ,u.name userName FROM trail t, users u WHERE t.userNo = u.userNo AND t.trailNo = #{trailNo}
SELECT u.userNo ,u.name ,i.orgName ,i.saveName ,i.filePath FROM users u, images i WHERE i.type = 'users' AND i.useNo = #{userNo}
SELECT trailNo ,name ,distance ,eta FROM trail WHERE locationNo = 1174010900 AND status = 'T'
